ChangeRefreshRate: 更改显示屏刷新率以跟视频同步
ChangeRefreshRateHelp: Changes the primary display refresh rate to closer align with the currently playing video stream. Reportedly works better when Video Display Sync is enabled as well.
UserRefreshRateHelp: Add Refresh Rates in the order of preference and separate with semicolon (ex. 50;60;23)
LabelUpmixAudioForHelp: Upmix音频利用所有扬声器通道。
EnableVideoDisplaySyncingHelp: Resample audio to match the video. This mode will also try to adjust audio speed to compensate for other drift. (This means it will play the audio at a different speed every once in a while to reduce the A/V difference.)
EnableInterpolationHelp: Reduce stuttering caused by mismatches in the video fps and display refresh rate (also known as judder).
SettingRequiresHighEnd: This setting requires a high end system.
LabelOutputRangeHelp: It is advisable to use your graphics driver's color range option instead, if available.
AudioDelay2325Help: Audio delay in milliseconds for videos with framerates from 23-25 fps.
EnableExclusiveAudioModeHelp: 启用独占输出模式。 在这种模式下，系统通常被锁定，只有Emby才能输出音频。
